p:
Valganciclovir is the L-valyl ester prodrug of ganciclovir. Oral valganciclovir is well absorbed and converted to ganciclovir by first-pass intestinal or hepatic metabolism.
79 The bioavailability of ganciclovir after valganciclovir administration is about 60%, and peak plasma concentrations are achieved in 1 to 3 hours.
80, 81 Valganciclovir is eliminated renally as ganciclovir.
